name: Riso Printer
description:
Mille Feuille is our riso printer! It is a SF5130U. It can print up to legal sized paper.

Resolution:
* Scanning Resolution: 600 dpi × 600 dpi
* Printing: 300 dpi × 600 dpi
* Quick Master Making mode: 300 dpi × 400 dpi

Maximum Scanning Area:
* 11 11/16 inches × 17 inches (297 mm × 432 mm)

It has a number of colourful inks, including:
* Aqua
* Black
* Florescent Pink
* Light lime
* Sunflower
* Violet

images.alt_text: A riso printer covered in little stickers, resting on a wood floor with a green cable in front.
A bunch of riso inks in a shelf
